title: Act 2007 (No. 9 of 2007) (as adapted by the Education and Skills (Alteration
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Education (Miscellaneous Provisions)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Education (Miscellaneous Provisions) 

Act 2007 (Section 7) (Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited education (miscellaneous provisions) act 2007 (section 7) (commencement) order 2021

title: Act 2007 (No. 9 of 2007) (as adapted by the Education and Skills (Alteration
heading: 2. The 23rd day of June 2021 is appointed as the day on which section 7
text_raw:
2. The 23rd day of June 2021 is appointed as the day on which section 7 
of the Education (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2007 (No. 9 of 2007) shall 
come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

18 June, 2021. 

NORMA FOLEY, 

Minister for Education. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th June, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [306] 3
